description:
Rosalie la Morliere is an obedient and timid girl from slums. After her mother was run over she swears that she will kill the person who was in the carriage.
When her mother is dying she tells Rosalie the truth that she is not her real mother, her real mother is Martine Gabrielle.
Oscar decides to help Rosalie with revenge and teaches her the art of fencing, manners, history, and other courtly skills.
At a party, Rosalie recognizes the Duchess de Polignac, the lady who was in the carriage but Oscar tells her to wait with the revenge.
Soon after that they found out that Martine Gabrielle is former name of Duchess de Polignac.
name: Rosalie la Morliere
